Top-3 Similar Questions: au_926116: Share my VPN connection with other LAN users
su_1633155: Share wifi connection with ethernet
so_64428220: sharing internet connection from two different connections with iptables
Top-3 Scripts:
au_926116: iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o tun+ -j MASQUERADE

iptables -A FORWARD -i wlan+ -o tun+ -j ACCEPT
iptables -A FORWARD -o tun+ -j ACCEPT
iptables -A FORWARD -i tun+ -m conntrack --ctstate ESTABLISHED,RELATED   -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -i tun+ -j ACCEPT
su_1633155: sudo iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o wlan0 -j MASQUERADE

so_64428220: iptables -A FORWARD -o wlan0 -i eth0 -s 192.168.2.0/24 -m conntrack --ctstate NEW -j ACCEPT
iptables -A FORWARD -m conntrack --ctstate ESTABLISHED,RELATED -j ACCEPT
iptables -t nat -F POSTROUTING
iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o wlan0 -j MASQUERADE
iptables-save | tee /etc/iptables.sav
iptables-restore < /etc/iptables.sav
sysctl net.ipv4.ip_forward=1
ip route add default via 192.168.2.230
/etc/init.d/networking restart

iptables -D FORWARD -o wlan0 -i eth0 -s 192.168.2.0/24 -m conntrack --ctstate NEW -j ACCEPT
iptables -D FORWARD -m conntrack --ctstate ESTABLISHED,RELATED -j ACCEPT
iptables -t nat -F POSTROUTING
iptables-save | tee /etc/iptables.sav
iptables-restore < /etc/iptables.sav
sysctl net.ipv4.ip_forward=0
ip route del 192.168.2.0/24
/etc/init.d/networking restart

iptables -D FORWARD -o ppp0 -i eth0 -s 192.168.2.0/24 -m conntrack --ctstate NEW -j ACCEPT
iptables -D FORWARD -m conntrack --ctstate ESTABLISHED,RELATED -j ACCEPT
iptables -t nat -F POSTROUTING
iptables-save | tee /etc/iptables.sav
iptables-restore < /etc/iptables.sav
sysctl net.ipv4.ip_forward=0
ip route del 192.168.2.0/24
/etc/init.d/networking restart
